metadata.dc:author: Nieto, A
Redondo, E R
Barrios, J M
metadata.dc:description: Seven patients suffering from obstructive sleeping sickness syndrome and operated on U-P-P-P-., were controlled, one year later, through the polysomnographic test. The tracings showed a clear improvement compared with the preoperative records. Best results are gained in those cases with lesser apneic degree.
metadata.dc:title: Uvulopalatofaringoplastia, seguimiento de un a√±o.
[Uvulo-palato-pharyngoplasty, 1-yr follow-up].
